title: For a Luxe Fly-Fishing Trip, Try Bermuda
text: I HAD NEVER considered fly fishing for bonefish in Bermuda. Chasing the elusive, silver-green creatures, prized for their fight, was something you did at remote outposts and rustic camps, where showering was optional and accommodations primitive. Such a trip could be fun for a few days, but you’d never dare drag your wife or kids along. And fly fishing is hardly the first thing to come to mind on an island of genteel sports like cricket, golf, tennis, sailing and snorkeling. In Bermuda, even cocktailing is arguably a sport. Most visitors completely fail to explore the possibilities for inshore fishing, specifically with...
description: On this island of rum swizzles and posh golf resorts, an angler goes in search of the elusive bonefish.
